sarah.name: Sarah Barreto Ornellas
sarah.bio: Sarah is a rising sophomore and a prospective Biomedical Engineering major. Her experiences in one of the largest – and socially unequal – cities of Brazil sparkled her interest in health inequities and how to solve them. Sarah is involved in Yale’s chapter of Engineering World Health, the Yale Global Health Review and AIESEC. In her free time, she pursues her interests in dance and photography.

felipe.name: Felipe Aragão Pires
felipe.bio: Felipe is a rising sophomore, majoring in Computer Science and Economics. He currently serves as Tech and Media Chair for the BCY. Felipe is interested in ways to connect Computer Science and the humanities. On campus, he is part of the Liberal Party and works as a Student Developer.

luis.name: Luis Fernando
luis.bio: Luis Fernando is a rising junior from Guarulhos in Jonathan Edwards College, majoring in Astrophysics. He served as the BCY VP during 2015-2016, and currently is the President-elect for the Club. At Yale, Luis is the Newbie Captain of the Ballroom Dance Team; one of the International Peer Liaisons; a voluntary teacher for Splash; and a part-time Astrophysics researcher. You are also likely to find him in the JE Buttery playing pool and eating chicken quesadillas, or watching Parks and Rec in his room.

will.name: Willian Hitoshi Kawakami
will.bio: Willian is a Exchange Student majoring in Computer Science at UNICAMP (Universidade Estadual de Campinas) that  had the amazing opportunity to taste a little bit of the Liberal Arts at Yale.

davi.name: Davi Lemos da Silva
davi.bio: Davi is a rising sophomore very passionate about his college, Saybrook, his country, Brazil, and his soccer team, Corinthians. He is the current Vice President for the Brazil Club at Yale and plans to major in Computer Science and Psychology. His various interests range from artificial intelligence to traditional Brazilian music and gastronomy. He is also the Vice President of Marketing for AIESEC at Yale and a part of the Yale Club Basketball team.

guga.name: Gustavo Galvão Avena
guga.bio: Gustavo is a junior in Computer Engineering, at UNICAMP, Brazil. Interested in web development, information security and entrepreneurship, he’s currently interning at Paperless Post, a startup in New York City.

cirigliano.name: Luiz Fernando Cirigliano Villela
cirigliano.bio: Luiz is a senior in Computer Engineering, at UNICAMP, Brazil. Interested in mobile apps, social networks and data analysis, he’s currently interning at Google LA over the summer.

simoes.name: Gabriel Mosquera Simões
simoes.bio: Gabriel is a senior at UNICAMP, in Brazil, studying Mechanical Engineering. He was part of the 2015-2016 Y-VISP program, studying Computer Science and Entrepreneurship at Yale for a year. Interested in technology and entrepreneurship, Gabriel is currently working as a developer at the Industry Lab, a tech startup in Cambridge, MA.

Seon Augusto.name: Seon Augusto de Souza Ferreira
Seon Augusto.from: Salvador (Bahia de todos os santos, encantos e axé).
Seon Augusto.bio: Seon is a prefrosh who intends to major in Chemical and Environmental Engineering. He is very passionate about the sciences and their possibilities, specially chemistry and biology; a passion born with scientific olympiads. However, he is also willing to enjoy every opportunity of a Liberal Arts education, studying from philosophy to computer science. He likes dancing, teaching and stories about magical/fictional worlds.
